import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { Jumbotron } from 'react-bootstrap'; import StarRatingComponent from 'react-star-rating-component'; const GameDetail = () => { const location = useLocation(); const game = location.state.game; return (

{game.name}

Notes du jeu :

{game.rating}



Date de sortie :

{game.released}

Plateformes :

{game.platforms.map(p => `${p.platform.name} | `)}

Genre :

{game.genres.map(m => `${m.name} `)}

{game.short_screenshots.map(p =>)}

); }; export default GameDetail;
